page.title: 03A DAY IN MY LIFE (2)
page.content: very much.At 10.45a.m. we go out to play.We play Colours.It is a bit like Tig.After play we do Spelling Workshop,I hate that.At 11:30a.m. some people do recorders.I do that it is good.At 12:00 we have lunch,I have sandwiches.At about 12:30p.m. we go out to play until 1:00p.m then we come in.We change our library books and then read for 25 minutes.If it is fine weather we go outside for games.It is winter, we are doing soccer.Our teacher, Mr Chivers, picks two captains.Today I am a captain.I have picked Chris,Mark,Richard and Danny. They are all good footballers.I pick three other people.Mr Chivers blows the whistle and we start.The other side has not got a very good team,so when we finish we are leading 16-2.We go inside and get changed . Then Mr Chivers reads a story to us
